# Data and libraries

Load necessary libraries and CNValidatron package.

```{r libs, cache = F}
library(data.table)
library(ggplot2)
setwd('../CNValidatron_fl')
devtools::load_all()
setwd('../NSHG_CNVs_workshop_2024')
```
